headline: Earnings season looks 'good' so far, but is it too early to tell?

headline: Big Banks earnings week wraps up: Expert takeaways
summary: Big Banks kicked off earnings season this week, with JPMorgan (JPM), Citi (C), Bank of America (BAC), Wells Fargo (WFC), Goldman Sachs (GS), and Morgan Stanley (MS) all reporting quarterly results. CFRA Research director of equity research Ken Leon and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter David Hollerith join Market Catalysts host Julie Hyman to discuss their top takeaways from the results.
